title: Tahini swirl brownies
ingredients: ['For the tahini swirl', '150g Greek yoghurt', '240g tahini', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk', 'For the brownies', '225g unsalted butter, melted', '250g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '150g plain flour', '65g unsweetened cocoa powder', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon baking powder', '1/4 teaspoon salt']
